item.title: Cystotomy or bladder stone surgery basics
item.description: If your pet is suffering from bladder stones that are unable to be dissolved with a special diet or too big to pass, it is likely they will need to be surgically removed. In this article, you’ll learn what a bladder stone surgery (or cystotomy) involves, and the signs your pet might show if recovery isn’t going well. Large bladder stones are not the only reason your pet might require a cystotomy.
